description: This file declares external functions for setting up and cleaning up Breakpad crash reporting support in C or C++ code. It is a header file defining the interface for Breakpad helper utilities.

methods.name: breakpadHelperSetup
methods.description: Initializes the Breakpad crash reporting system.

methods.name: breakpadHelperCleanup
methods.description: Cleans up resources associated with the Breakpad crash reporting system.
